name: Glass Heart (itch)
description:
A dungeon-crawling, puzzle-solving RPG

You play as an unfortunate witch who's trapped inside her own mind labyrinth with no arms. Through the guidance of her imaginary friend The Blue Bunbun, she will defeat her worst fear and wake up from the slumber that was casted by herself.

W,A,S,D to move

Space to Interact

esc/right click to quit

music credit:
